languages.text: {n}Женщина испытующе смотрит на вас, потом отвечает, понизив голос.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, известно. Только давайте не кричать об этом на весь бар. Вы уйдете, а я-то останусь... а анверы не уважают никаких договоренностей, законов, другие банды тоже. Посмотришь косо в их сторону — ты труп".

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина испытующе смотрит на вас, потом отвечает, понизив голос.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, известно. Только давайте не кричать об этом на весь бар. Вы уйдете, а я-то останусь... а анверы не уважают никаких договоренностей, законов, другие банды тоже. Посмотришь косо в их сторону — ты труп".

languages.text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина испытующе смотрит на вас, потом отвечает, понизив голос.{/n} "Допустим. Допустим, известно. Только давайте не кричать об этом на весь бар. Вы уйдете, а я-то останусь... а анверы не уважают никаких договоренностей, законов, другие банды тоже. Посмотришь косо в их сторону — ты труп".

traits.locale_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice.{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, shall we? You'll leave just fine, but I'll stay... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

You'll leave just fine, but I'll stay... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

{n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

languages.text: {n}她探询地看了你一眼，之后低声回答道。{/n}“或许吧，或许我确实知道某些事情，但咱们还是别在这间酒吧里说了，好吗？毕竟喝完酒之后，你只要一走了之就好，可我还要在这里呆上很久……安维尔帮不在乎任何协议、法律，也不在乎别的帮派。只要你看了他们一眼，让他们觉得不爽，你就死定了。”
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}她探询地看了你一眼，之后低声回答道。{/n}“或许吧，或许我确实知道某些事情，但咱们还是别在这间酒吧里说了，好吗？毕竟喝完酒之后，你只要一走了之就好，可我还要在这里呆上很久……安维尔帮不在乎任何协议、法律，也不在乎别的帮派。只要你看了他们一眼，让他们觉得不爽，你就死定了。”

languages.text: {n}Te observa con suspicacia y responde en voz baja:{/n} «Puede ser. Puede que sepa algo, pero no me gustaría que se enterara todo el bar. Cuando tú salgas por esa puerta yo tendré que quedarme aquí... y los Anvers no respetan ningún acuerdo, ley ni a otras bandas. Si los miras mal, estás muerto».
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te observa con suspicacia y responde en voz baja:{/n} «Puede ser. Puede que sepa algo, pero no me gustaría que se enterara todo el bar. Cuando tú salgas por esa puerta yo tendré que quedarme aquí... y los Anvers no respetan ningún acuerdo, ley ni a otras bandas. Si los miras mal, estás muerto».

languages.text: {n}彼女はこちらを探るように見つめ、低い声で答えた。{/n}「知ってるかもね…でも、今ここであけっぴろげに話すのはまずい。あたしはあんたがここを去った後もこのバーにいる…そして、アンヴァースは協定も法律も他のギャングも尊重しない。あいつらを怒らせたら死んだも同然だ」
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はこちらを探るように見つめ、低い声で答えた。{/n}「知ってるかもね…でも、今ここであけっぴろげに話すのはまずい。あたしはあんたがここを去った後もこのバーにいる…そして、アンヴァースは協定も法律も他のギャングも尊重しない。あいつらを怒らせたら死んだも同然だ」

languages.text: {n}Sie blickt dich prüfend an und antwortet dann mit gesenkter Stimme:{/n} "Vielleicht. Vielleicht weiß ich etwas. Aber das muss nicht die ganze Bar mitkriegen, in Ordnung? Ich werde noch hier sein, wenn Ihr die Bar längst verlassen habt ... und die Anvers respektieren keine Absprachen, Gesetze oder andere Banden. Ihr müsst sie nur schief ansehen – und schon seid Ihr tot."
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie blickt dich prüfend an und antwortet dann mit gesenkter Stimme:{/n} "Vielleicht. Vielleicht weiß ich etwas. Aber das muss nicht die ganze Bar mitkriegen, in Ordnung? Ich werde noch hier sein, wenn Ihr die Bar längst verlassen habt ... und die Anvers respektieren keine Absprachen, Gesetze oder andere Banden. Ihr müsst sie nur schief ansehen – und schon seid Ihr tot."

languages.text: {n}Elle vous lance un regard inquisiteur, avant de répondre tout bas.{/n} « C'est possible. J'ai peut-être quelques infos. Mais je préférerais autant en parler loin des oreilles indiscrètes, d'accord ? Vous finirez vite par repartir, mais moi, je vais rester là... et les Anver ne respectent ni les accords, ni les lois, ni les autres gangs. Un regard de travers, et vous êtes mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle vous lance un regard inquisiteur, avant de répondre tout bas.{/n} « C'est possible. J'ai peut-être quelques infos. Mais je préférerais autant en parler loin des oreilles indiscrètes, d'accord ? Vous finirez vite par repartir, mais moi, je vais rester là... et les Anver ne respectent ni les accords, ni les lois, ni les autres gangs. Un regard de travers, et vous êtes mort. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, sorgulayan gözlerle baktıktan sonra sesini alçaltıp cevap veriyor.{/n} "Mümkün. Belki bir şeyler biliyorumdur. Yine de tüm bara ilan etmeyelim, olur mu? Siz bu bardan çekip gittiğinizde ben burada olmaya devam edeceğim sonuçta. Anverlar da ne anlaşmaları ne yasaları ne de başka çeteleri takar. Yan bile baksan gebertirler."
languages.original_text: {n}She gives you a searching look, then answers in a lowered voice,{/n} "Maybe. Maybe I do know something. But let's not shout about it to the whole bar, all right? I'll be here long after you walk out of this bar... and the Anvers respect no agreements, laws, or other gangs. You look at them the wrong way — and you're dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana önce sana keskin bir bakış atıyor, ardından da kısık bir sesle cevap veriyor.{/n} "Belki. Belki bir şeyler biliyorumdur. Yine de bunu tüm bara ilan etmeyelim, olur mu? Siz bu bardan çekip gittiğinizde bile ben yine burada kalacağım sonuçta. Anverlar da ne anlaşmalara, ne yasalara, ne de başka çetelere saygı duymuyor. Yan bakan çıkarsa gebertiyorlar."
